short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finds & clicks the merge request button when sensing M + R keystrokes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of clicking the "Merge" button? This plugin allows you to click the button using a keystroke! Press M + R and feel the button!
